dt-api.name: keys.enabled()
dt-api.summary: Determine the KeyTable enabled state for a table

type.name: keys.enabled()
type.description: Query the API to determine the KeyTable's state for the table.

dt-api.description:
This method can be used to determine the state of KeyTable on a DataTable, as controlled by `-api keys.enable()` and `-api keys.disable()`. The values that the method can return match what can be set with `-api keys.enable()`:
* `true` - Fully enable KeyTable * `false` - Fully disable KeyTable (`kt-api keys.disable()`) * `-string navigation-only` - Respond to navigation inputs only
